alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 23 at 1:32PM PST until December 26 at 4:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Periods of heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 3 feet above 8000 feet...5 to 10 inches above 6000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes. * WHEN...From 4 PM Wednesday to 4 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Roads leading into the Sierra will be impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy snow is expected mainly above 7000 feet today. Snow levels will fall Friday through the weekend with additional accumulations of snow likely.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County
